articles.title: Baltimore defendant throws metal water pitcher, strikes judge in head after receiving life term: reports
articles.description: A judge in Baltimore required medical treatment Wednesday after a defendant she had just sentenced to life in prison grabbed a metal water pitcher and threw it, striking the judge in her forehead, according to reports.

articles.title: Maine mother charged with daughter's murder detailed abuse in police recordings
articles.description: Maine state prosecutors played police recordings of a mother admitting to severely beating her 10-year-old daughter during a murder trial in the child’s death.
articles.content:
BELFAST, MAINE (AP) - Maine state prosecutors played police recordings of a mother admitting to severely beating her 10-year-old daughter during a murder trial in the child’s death.
